msbt.message: Alright, we are two down and docked at the target ! Delta Oscar Delta Oscar is go.

First time getting your pontoons wet on tour? Let me brief you on mystery-island procedure. First, we run the "finders keepers" protocol here. Lumber, fruit, fish, whatever? Yours if you can carry it. Next up: break a tool? Forget one? I can requisition you a replacement. Gotta charge you miles, though. Also, there's one redline item you need to memorize like your favorite latte order Anything you leave behind stays here. We don't come back to these places.<10_4 /> Ever. I actually burn the flight plans afterward. Security reasons. Can't explain more than that. Think that's everything. Go explore. If you get into trouble, ask yourself, "What would dodos do?"
Meanwhile, I'll be in a holding pattern here. Get in touch when you need tools or travel. Go catch some bees and chop some trees!
Bellbottom this is stovetop , do you require assistance? Over.
I'm ready to go home.
I need tools.
Never mind.
You ready to punt pontoons and fly Soaring here back to ? You positive? Be VERY positive, 'cause I wouldn't want you leaving anything behind. So, again You ready?
Yep!
No, wait
Roger! Lifting off November Oscar Whisker.
Roger! Belayed and backing off. Whenever you need our services, just flag this dodo down.
Tools? Roger! Lemme just pull up the Mileage Menu for you
Tools? Sorry, civilian—your gear's at the limit already. Come back when you've got a free hand for a tool.
Oh, you're leveled out and loaded up? Roger. Let me know if you need something.
is , but it looks like you're low on go and dry on miles. Once you top up the tank, come on back to barter for bargains.
is . Is that gonna fly?
Sounds good!
Never mind.
Roger! Utilize it or futilize it!
Give a squawk if you need anything else.

Whew! Had me worried there, civilian. Thought you might have fought the barn! Dodo Tower this is Dodo One, cancel red alert. Ground-pounder's up and around. <100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOn" />Roger that, Dodo One! Standing down alert.<100_3 arg="PlaneAnnounceOff" /><10_7 arg="30" /> When you're ready, you can head on out again. Just watch out for bogeys and keep an eye on your six.

And we have touchdown! You are at your May Day Tour destination!Now, this tour's different than most.<10_4 /> Whole island's a giant maze! Nothing an aerial view wouldn't help, but That's not why we're here! This is a navigation tour! You copy? The point is to find your way through!We've stowed your gear back at the airport counter. So you'll start this mission with empty wings. Or hands.We big-shot bird types rely on our inner radar to get us around. It's a pretty nifty trick. But you ground-bound goslings will have to zero in on whatever you can find in the maze to reach your target. If you get stuck or grounded or lost in a fog bank or whatever, just hail the Rescue Service on your phone!Our whiskered allies will reset things so you can refuel, regroup, and restart the maze. And if you ever feel like you need a little extra intel, I might have a hint or two for you. So. Time to get going. Right about November Oscar Whisker! Good luck, and wheels up!
Lost in the fog? Need navigational assistance? Spill on your flight plan? How can I help?
I need a hint.
I need a tool.
I want to go home.
Actually, I'm good.
Just so I know our signals aren't getting crossed: You can't revisit this exact May Day Tour island again. You sure about this?
Yep!
No, wait

Negatory. No joy. You're going into this mission Whisker Tango—that's "without tools" to you civvies. For this May Day Tour, you gotta navigate to the target with limited resources. You copy? I can't give out tools no matter how nicely you ask. Even if you outrank me⁠—and you don't⁠—answer's no.Apologies, my featherless friend. I hope you understand that's just the way the dodos do it.
A hint, huh? Roger. Guidance incoming.<10_4 /> Acquiring knowledge

Here's some intel: Did you know you can get a boost in your afterburners by eating fruit? Makes you strong! With that kinda fuel, you can uproot trees or break rocks with a shovel or an axe. Might even hit Mach 37!

I guess that's a big negatory on my "over and out." So let's talk hoppin' rivers. Hoppin' narrow rivers, copy?To hop a river, just press  in the direction you wanna hop. I'm not gonna say "over and out" this time
If you get stuck with no way out, deploy your phone and reach out to the Rescue Service. They'll reset the island so you can take another run at the maze.

OK. Say there's a tree in your way. You've got two options.Option one: Eat some fruit, then dig the whole thing up with a shovel.Option two: Chop it down with a decent axe, then excavate the stump with a shovel. Over and out!
Here's a little more intel for you: If you need tools, try crafting them.The DIY flight path is tried and true: Get materials, rendezvous with the nearest simple DIY workbench, boom.
For the love of Nook's ever-flyin' ! Did you soar through the entire maze, ?
I did!
Piece o' cake!

Way to soar through! You'll have to let ol' Nook know.Oop Put the air brake on. Seems you have something on you these pilot's eyes have never seen before.Let me get this straight. You got it from someone who just happened to be hoverin' around this island? Well then, Dodo Airlines will proudly deliver your prize to your home.One dilly of a May Day Tour, huh?<10_4 /> Squawk the word, and we'll wing you back to your home hangar. Oh! If you're stuck, grounded, lost in a fog bank, whateverjust hail the Rescue Service on your phone.Our whiskered allies will reset things so you can refuel, regroup, and restart the maze.
Attention on deck! What's next on your flight plan?
Time to head home.
Cancel that. I'm good.

Looks like the Rescue Service folks took care of you, !The island's been reset back to the way it was, so feel free to attempt the maze mission again if you like. If you get re-stuck, I'm sure the Rescue Service will help again. Keeps 'em from gettin' bored! Take a moment to get yourself together, and get back in there. Fly proud!
Yearning for ?<10_4 /> If you want to do the maze again, please use the Rescue Service.
I'm heading home!
Wait a sec.

We'll make sure all your things are back in your pockets once we're on the ground on .However, the gift you received from your new island friend We'll send that directly to your house.Find it at your mailbox shortly. And that wraps us up. Ready for takeoff?
Yep!
No, wait

We'll make sure all your things are back in your pockets once we're on the ground on .However, the gift you received from your new island friend We'll send that directly to your house.Same goes for any Bell vouchers you might have acquired while here. Find them at your mailbox shortly. And that wraps us up. Ready for takeoff?
Yep!
No, wait

We'll make sure all your things are back in your pockets once we're on the ground on .However, any Bell vouchers you might have acquired while here will wind up in your mailbox shortly. And that wraps us up. Ready for takeoff?
Yep!
No, wait
There's no coming back to this May Day Tour. Ready to go?
Yep!
No, wait
